member.name: P:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.Rank
member.summary: Gets the rank (number of dimensions) of the System.Array. For example, a one-dimensional array returns 1, a two-dimensional array returns 2, and so on.
member.returns: The rank (number of dimensions) of the System.Array.

member.name: P:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.Length
member.summary: Gets a 32-bit integer that represents the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the System.Array.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer that represents the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the System.Array; zero if there are no elements in the array.
member.exception: The array is multidimensional and contains more than System.Int32.MaxValue elements.

member.name: P:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets elements of the array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.Clone
member.summary: Creates a shallow copy of the System.Array.
member.returns: A shallow copy of the System.Array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.CopyTo(Waher.Content.Asn1.Array{`0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array starting at the specified destination array index. The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
member.param: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current array.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in array at which copying begins.
member.exception: array is null.
index is less than the lower bound of array.
array is multidimensional.-or-The number of elements in the source array is greater than the available number of elements from index to the end of the destination array.
The type of the source System.Array cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
The source array is multidimensional.
At least one element in the source System.Array cannot be cast to the type of destination array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an System.Collections.IEnumerator for the System.Array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an System.Collections.IEnumerator for the System.Array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.GetLength(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements in the specified dimension of the System.Array.
member.param: A zero-based dimension of the System.Array whose length needs to be determined.
member.returns: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements in the specified dimension.
member.exception: dimension is less than zero.-or-dimension is equal to or greater than System.Array.Rank.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.GetLowerBound(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index of the first element of the specified dimension in the array.
member.param: A zero-based dimension of the array whose starting index needs to be determined.
member.returns: The index of the first element of the specified dimension in the array.
member.exception: dimension is less than zero.-or-dimension is equal to or greater than System.Array.Rank.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.GetUpperBound(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index of the last element of the specified dimension in the array.
member.param: A zero-based dimension of the array whose upper bound needs to be determined.
member.returns: The index of the last element of the specified dimension in the array, or -1 if the specified dimension is empty.
member.exception: dimension is less than zero.-or-dimension is equal to or greater than System.Array.Rank.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.GetValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value at the specified position in the one-dimensional System.Array. The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
member.param: A 32-bit integer that represents the position of the System.Array element to get.
member.returns: The value at the specified position in the one-dimensional System.Array.
member.exception: The current System.Array does not have exactly one dimension.
index is outside the range of valid indexes for the current System.Array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.GetValue(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Gets the value at the specified position in the multidimensional System.Array. The indexes are specified as an array of 32-bit integers.
member.param: A one-dimensional array of 32-bit integers that represent the indexes specifying the position of the System.Array element to get.
member.returns: The value at the specified position in the multidimensional System.Array.
member.exception: indices is null.
The number of dimensions in the current System.Array is not equal to the number of elements in indices.
Any element in indices is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current System.Array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes every element of the value-type System.Array by calling the default constructor of the value type.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.SetValue(System.Object,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the multidimensional System.Array. The indexes are specified as an array of 32-bit integers.
member.param: The new value for the specified element.
A one-dimensional array of 32-bit integers that represent the indexes specifying the position of the element to set.
member.exception: indices is null.
The number of dimensions in the current System.Array is not equal to the number of elements in indices.
value cannot be cast to the element type of the current System.Array.
Any element in indices is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current System.Array.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Asn1.Array`1.SetValue(System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the one-dimensional System.Array. The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
member.param: The new value for the specified element.
A 32-bit integer that represents the position of the System.Array element to set.
member.exception: The current System.Array does not have exactly one dimension.
value cannot be cast to the element type of the current System.Array.
index is outside the range of valid indexes for the current System.Array.
